traits.Trampling Charge: If the mammoth moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 18+1d6 + 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the mammoth can make one stomp attack against it as a bonus action.

actions.Gore: Melee Weapon Attack: +10+1d6 + 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 25 (4d8 + 7) piercing damage.
actions.Stomp: Melee Weapon Attack: +10+1d6 + 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one prone creature. Hit: 29 (4d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage.
